rooms.description: Entrance hall with reception area and storage.
Spacious living room with large windows for natural light and a connection to the courtyard.
Modern dining area adjacent to the kitchen.
Well-equipped industrial-style kitchen with ventilation and adequate lighting.
Central courtyard designed for natural light and ventilation; serves as a communal space for the household.

openings.description: Main entrance with ample space adhering to Vastu principles.
Secondary exit for utility and garden access.

balconies.description: Spacious balcony with views of the garden.
Spacious balcony with direct access to the courtyard.

design_principles.description: Large windows and open spaces for ample natural light.
Central courtyard and strategically placed openings ensure cross-ventilation.
